content.rendered:
Spotted this when walking to the shop the other day. The colours are amazing. Hard to compose and a photo doesn’t do it justice. Of course, a Hipstamatic or Noir would only detract from the great natural colours.

Here’s the full gallery with a Hipstamatic too!
